Minecraft: PC demo play free

PC gamers can try the Minecraft demo for free. You can download the game for free in our download area.

  1. To do this, click on the “Download” button on our download website.
  2. Then start the downloaded file and follow the installation instructions.
  3. Once the installation is complete, the Minecraft demo will start automatically.
  4. In the start menu of the game you can start Minecraft directly via “Play Demo World”.
  5. Alternatively, you can also play Minecraft offshoots on portals such as “spiele-kostenlos-online.de” in the browser.
